    • Field Detail

      • name

        public java.lang.String name
        Used as the PointOfInterest's description after being visited.

      • remove

        public boolean remove
        Set to false to flag an event as non-instantaneous, meaning that it can be first defined but not "completed" right away, requiring a squad (same or another) to come back to resolve it. Note that at some point this must be flagged as true so that the WildEvent can be completed and removed from the World. If this is false, EventCard.happen(Squad) might be called more than once for the same instance of this card.

      • location

        protected PointOfInterest location

    • Constructor Detail

      • WildEvent

        public WildEvent​(java.lang.String name,
                 PointOfInterest l)
        Creates a named card. Subclasses should have zero-argument, reflection-friendly constructors.
